e_coupon.sys.core.dao

Interface CompanyDAO

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CompanyDaoDB

    public interface CompanyDAO

    CompanyDAO interface describe the Company C.R.U.D (Create,Read,Update,Delete) actions.

    Purpose:The Application layer would eventually Creates Java Beans (Company, Coupon etc.)

    and would sent those to the DAO that will implement at DAODB and convert to SQL commands using JDBC.

    Since:
    2018-09-06
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Assaf Ben David

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void createCompany(Company company)
      createCompany method used to create a new Company entity in the DB using SQL commands and JDBC.
      java.util.Collection<Company> getAllCompanies()
      getAllCompanies method used to retrieve All existing Companies from the DB using SQL commands and JDBC.
      Company getCompany(long id)
      getCompany method used to retrieve specific existing Company by Id parameter from the DB using SQL commands and JDBC.
      java.util.Collection<Coupon> getCoupons(Company company)
      getCoupons method used to retrieve All Coupons published by the Company, from the DB using SQL commands and JDBC.
      boolean login(java.lang.String compName, java.lang.String password)
      login method used to verify if the Company Name combined with password exist in the DB using SQL and JDBS
      void removeCompany(Company company)
      removeCompany method used to remove a existing Company from the DB using SQL commands and JDBC.

      updateCompany method used to remove a existing Company from the DB using SQL commands and JDBC.

      • login

        boolean login(java.lang.String compName,
              java.lang.String password)
       throws couponSystemException
        login method used to verify if the Company Name combined with password exist in the DB using SQL and JDBS
        Parameters:
        compName - Company name
        password - Customer password
        Returns:
        boolean True/False meaning Company Name combined with password exist/ not exist in DB.

        couponSystemException
